tool.name: Classify.tree
tool.description: Get a consensus taxonomy for each node on a tree

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff - consensus confidence threshold
param.help: The default is 51, meaning 51%. Cutoff cannot be below 51

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The classify.tree_ command is used to get a consensus taxonomy for each node on a tree. Input is a taxonomy_ and a tree_ with optional name_ or group_ reference. The output is a tree_ and a summary..
